sentences.en: A great number of Egyptians are proficient in foreign languages.
sentences.cn: 很多埃及人都精通外语。

sentences.en: As with the transition from competent to proficient, the transition to Expert is also non-linear.
sentences.cn: 正如从“胜任”到“精通”的转变一样，转变为“专家”也是非线性的过程。

sentences.en: Given the amount of time designers spend manipulating visual patterns when creating product designs, they are likely to be highly proficient in this form of pattern recognition.
sentences.cn: 当在创造产品设计时，设计师们在利用视觉模式上花费了大量的时间，他们可能非常精通模式识别的这种形式。

sentences.en: He doesn't look like a proficient in golf.
sentences.cn: 他看起来不象是个打高尔夫球的专家.

sentences.en: He was proficient in all questions of genealogy.
sentences.cn: 他非常精通所有家谱的问题.

sentences.en: I think I'm quite proficient in both written and spoken English.
sentences.cn: 我认为我在英语读写方面相当熟练.

sentences.en: It takes time to learn how to apply them and become proficient with them.
sentences.cn: 学会如何运用它们和对它们精通会花费大量的时间。

sentences.en: Mr. Barret is not proficient in diagnosis, let alone investigation.
sentences.cn: 巴瑞特先生不擅长诊断, 更不必提研究方面.

sentences.en: She is a proficient in music.
She is proficient at / in figure skating.
She is proficient at this art.
She was very proficient in music.

words.tran_cn: 专业主义；专家的地位；特性或方法

trans.tran_en: able to do something well or skilfully
